attributes.action: Ban job agencies using spoof adverts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ban job agencies using spoof adverts, since these serve no purpose other than to increase the numbers of people on their books, many of whom the agency have no intention of assisting to find employment.  These advertisements are also placed with job centres.  Giving the impression that there are more jobs available than is the case.
